4785.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
4785.verse-english: By the star when it descends,

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ

clauses-english.clause: By the star when it descends,

4786.verse-english: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

clauses-english.clause: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed,
nor has he erred,

4787.verse-english: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

clauses-english.clause: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

4788.verse-english: It is not but a revelation revealed,

clauses-english.clause: It is not but a revelation revealed,

4789.verse-english: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

clauses-english.clause: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

4790.verse-english: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

clauses-english.clause: One of soundness.
And he rose to [his] true form

4791.verse-english: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

clauses-english.clause: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.
Then he approached and descended

4793.verse-english: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

clauses-english.clause: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

4794.verse-english: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

clauses-english.clause: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

4795.verse-english: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

clauses-english.clause: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

4796.verse-english: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

clauses-english.clause: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

4797.verse-english: And he certainly saw him in another descent

clauses-english.clause: And he certainly saw him in another descent

4798.verse-english: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

clauses-english.clause: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

4799.verse-english: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

clauses-english.clause: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

4800.verse-english: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

clauses-english.clause: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

4801.verse-english: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

clauses-english.clause: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve,
nor did it transgress [its limit].

4802.verse-arabic: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
4802.verse-english: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

clauses-arabic.clause: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ

clauses-english.clause: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

4803.verse-english: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

clauses-english.clause: So have you considered al-
Lat and al-
'Uzza?

4804.verse-english: And Manat, the third - the other one?

clauses-english.clause: And Manat,
the third -
the other one?

4805.verse-english: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

clauses-english.clause: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

4806.verse-english: That, then, is an unjust division.

clauses-english.clause: That,
then,
is an unjust division.

4807.verse-arabic: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
4807.verse-english: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

clauses-english.clause: They are not but [mere] names you have named them -
you and your forefathers -
for which God has sent down no authority.
They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire,
and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

4808.verse-english: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

clauses-english.clause: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

4809.verse-english: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

clauses-english.clause: Rather,
to God belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

4810.verse-arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
4810.verse-english: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

clauses-arabic.clause: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ

clauses-english.clause: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after God has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

4811.verse-arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
4811.verse-english: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

4812.verse-arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
4812.verse-english: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

clauses-english.clause: And they have thereof no knowledge.
They follow not except assumption,
and indeed,
assumption avails not against the truth at all.

4813.verse-arabic: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
4813.verse-english: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

clauses-arabic.clause: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا

clauses-english.clause: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

4814.verse-arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
4814.verse-english: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

clauses-english.clause: That is their sum of knowledge.
Indeed,
your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way,
and He is most knowing of who is guided.

4815.verse-arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
4815.verse-english: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

clauses-english.clause: And to God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth -
that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

4816.verse-arabic: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
4816.verse-english: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

clauses-english.clause: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities,
only [committing] slight ones.
Indeed,
your Lord is vast in forgiveness.
He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers.
So do not claim yourselves to be pure;
He is most knowing of who fears Him.

4817.verse-english: Have you seen the one who turned away

clauses-english.clause: Have you seen the one who turned away

4818.verse-english: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

clauses-english.clause: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

4819.verse-english: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

clauses-english.clause: Does he have knowledge of the unseen,
so he sees?

4820.verse-arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
4820.verse-english: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

clauses-arabic.clause: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

clauses-english.clause: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
And [of] Abraham,
who fulfilled [his obligations] -

4822.verse-english: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

clauses-english.clause: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

4823.verse-arabic: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
4823.verse-english: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

clauses-arabic.clause: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

clauses-english.clause: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

4824.verse-english: And that his effort is going to be seen -

clauses-english.clause: And that his effort is going to be seen -

4825.verse-english: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

clauses-english.clause: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

4826.verse-english: And that to your Lord is the finality

clauses-english.clause: And that to your Lord is the finality

4827.verse-english: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

clauses-english.clause: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

4828.verse-english: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

clauses-english.clause: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

4829.verse-english: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

clauses-english.clause: And that He creates the two mates -
the male and female -

4830.verse-english: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

clauses-english.clause: From a sperm-
drop when it is emitted

4831.verse-english: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

clauses-english.clause: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

4832.verse-english: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

clauses-english.clause: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

4833.verse-english: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

clauses-english.clause: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

4834.verse-english: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

clauses-english.clause: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

4835.verse-english: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

clauses-english.clause: And Thamud -
and He did not spare [them] -

4836.verse-arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
4836.verse-english: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

clauses-english.clause: And the people of Noah before.
Indeed,
it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

4837.verse-english: And the overturned towns He hurled down

clauses-english.clause: And the overturned towns He hurled down

4838.verse-english: And covered them by that which He covered.

clauses-english.clause: And covered them by that which He covered.

4839.verse-english: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

clauses-english.clause: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

4840.verse-english: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

clauses-english.clause: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
The Approaching Day has approached.

4842.verse-arabic: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
4842.verse-english: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

clauses-english.clause: Of it,
[from those] besides God,
there is no remover.

4843.verse-english: Then at this statement do you wonder?

clauses-english.clause: Then at this statement do you wonder?

4844.verse-english: And you laugh and do not weep

clauses-english.clause: And you laugh and do not weep
While you are proudly sporting?

4846.verse-english: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

clauses-english.clause: So prostrate to God and worship [Him].
